items.content_html: EasyEthers is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed to simplify interactions with Ethereum blockchain. Built on top of ethers.js, EasyEthers streamlines wallet management, transaction processing, and message signing to provide a seamless experience for developers working with Ethereum-based applications.
items.title: GGCodeLatam/EasyEthers: EasyEthers is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed to simplify interactions with Ethereum blockchain. Built on top of ethers.js, EasyEthers streamlines wallet management, transaction processing, and message signing to provide a seamless experience for developers working with Ethereum-based applications.
